channel.title: zabbix on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in zabbix on Martin's Blog

item.title: zenoss opennms comparison/比较
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 在我做任何比较之前还是先看看Wiki上对一系列网管监控软件的比较，源网页地址在 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Network_monitoring_comparison 上面一共列出了12中不同的开源软件，从13个方面以矩阵的方式

item.title: ZABBIX特点介绍，转自它们的网站
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: FROM：http://www.zabbix.com/features.php ZABBIX offers functionality that will make your IT resources look more transparent, and it will also help to easily identify performance and availability problems. ZABBIX greatly increases the productivity of system

item.title: What is ZABBIX?
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 第一次看到这个软件是在OpenNMS的邮件讨论组中，他们计划做一个vmware的image放到VMTN上 。我在VMTN里哪里点击了一下监控管
